H0.text: Where, specifically, is the junction known as 'the Crossroads of the World'. Piccadilly Circus

H1.text: Where, specifically, is the junction known as 'the Crossroads of the World'. Shibuya Crossing

H2.text: Where, specifically, is the junction known as 'the Crossroads of the World'. Leicester Square

H3.text: Where, specifically, is the junction known as 'the Crossroads of the World'. Timesquare

A4.text: Times Square is sometimes referred to as 'the Crossroads of the World'
